name: TheTip
description: TheTip is a fun platformer that challenges you. 24 levels (green to red) each the next level is more difficult than the previous one. Simple mechanics work well together. Despite the simplicity of the game, at first glance from you the speed of reaction. TheTip is a great time killer that won't let you get bored. To go to other levels, swipe with the left mouse button pressed to the right.
